articles.title: RB17 revealed: Adrian Newey’s last Red Bull car design - The Race
articles.description: The final Red Bull car designed by its departing design guru Adrian Newey has been revealed.
articles.content:
The final Red Bull car designed by its departing design guru Adrian Newey has been revealed.
The RB17 hypercar has been a pet project of Newey's for years and now we have our first proper look at th… [+2069 chars]

articles.author: Dani Ostanek
articles.title: Primož Roglič abandons the 2024 Tour de France - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Slovenian yellow jersey contender leaves the race ahead of stage 13 following stage 12 crash and time loss
articles.content:
A day on from his second crash in as many stages at the Tour de France, Primož Roglič has pulled out of the race ahead of Friday’s stage 13.
